name: Zakk Hazard The Deadly Spawn
description: zakk is trapped on mars to fend off mutants in this run & gun platforming adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: 1.5 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: 2 ghz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
